sentences.sContent: She crafted a version of the black-and-white tassel dress Oscar de la Renta sent down the runway last month by hand-sewing store-bought tassels onto a tank top.
sentences.sContent_eng: She crafted a version of the black-and-white tassel dress Oscar de la Renta sent down the runway last month by hand-sewing store-bought tassels onto a tank top.
sentences.sCn: 她缝制了奥斯卡•德拉伦塔（Oscar de la Renta）上个月在服装展示中推出的黑白两色的穗裙，把商店里买来的穗子缝到吊带背心上。

trans.tranOther: threads tied together at one end and hung as a decoration on clothes, curtains etc
